text: Dalibor Andonov ( ; 8 March 1973 – 9 September 2019), known professionally as Gru, was a Serbian rapper, musician and DJ. His song Biću tu from the 1996 album Gru 2 made him popular in Eastern Europe, as well as the 2010 release I dalje me žele alongside Serbian rapper Ajs Nigrutin. He was well-known in other countries of Eastern and Northern Europe. He has been dubbed The Serbian Rap Machine. Andonov was killed during a paragliding accident near Zemun, Belgrade on 9 September 2019 at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Serbian musicians Category:Rappers Category:DJs Category:Pop rappers
title: Gru (rapper)
